text: 3.24: Ro 5.1; Ef 1.7; 2.8; Kor 1.14; 1 T 2.6; 1 Pi 1.18-19Fhe Bakɨme fhura nza kora muuŋgiap, ana Krais Zisas muuŋgi ŋaarar panan, ana taagi nza vhezgiap, nza ndigap, kha zɨn nzan kaai, nza tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigi ma. Nza nduarira ŋaara vhuuŋ the muuŋgi ne nzuav, ana tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigir nzan kaai fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Fhe Bakɨme fhura Krais Zisasan ŋaara panan mba zɨn nza nɨɨŋgi.
